title: W3.CSSMaterial Design

metadata.description: Learn about W3.CSSMaterial Design with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Material Design
Material Design was designed by Google in 2014 and has later been adopted in many Google applications.
Material Design uses elements that remind us of paper and ink. In addition the elements have realistic shadows 
and hover effects.
Google Material Design
Material Design Look Using W3.CSS
W3.CSS is the perfect stylesheet for designing applications with a "Material Design" look:

Material Design Look (Color Themes)
Places to Visit
Cinque Terre
The Cinque Terre (five lands) is a portion of the Italian Riviera.
The coastline with five villages: Monterosso, Vernazza, Corniglia, Manarola, and Riomaggiore
is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Monterosso
Monterosso al Mare is located at the center of a small natural gulf, protected by a small artificial reef,
in the Riviera of La Spezia. It is the northernmost village of the Cinque Terre.
Vernazza
Vernazza is another of the five towns in the region.
Vernazza is the fourth town heading north. It has no car traffic, and is one of the truest
"fishing villages" on the Italian Riviera.
Europe Italy

summary: This tutorial covers W3.CSSMaterial Design concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use W3.CSSMaterial Design effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of W3.CSSMaterial Design and how to apply it in your projects.
